description: The Ministry of National Defence has a requirement for a quantity of 100 x Universal Secure KVM Switch, 4-Port Dual Head, Belkin, # F1DN204KVM-UNN4 or equivalent, plus client and inventory options as per the List of Deliverables in the request for quotation.
full_summary:
## Request for Proposal

### Solicitation No.
2BH4168601/A
### Ministry
Department of National Defence

### Request Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking a proposal for the procurement of a Universal Secure KVM Switch, 4-Port Dual Head, with the following specifications:
- Belkin model # F1DN204KVM-UNN4 or equivalent
- Quantity: 100 units
- Delivery destination: Quebec, QC
- Delivery date: 60 federal government working days from contract award

The procurement includes the following options:
- Client software
- Inventory management

### Security Requirements
None

### Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements
None

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

### Contact Information
- Michael Boualavong, Procurement Officer
- Shared Services Canada
- 99 Metcalfe Street, 11th Floor
- Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 1E3
- Telephone: (613) 402-8895
- Email: [michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca), [emily.meas@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:emily.meas@ssc-spc.gc.ca)

### Notice Details
- Publication Date: 2024-06-20
- Tender Closing Date: 2024-07-09T14:00:00
- Amendment Number: 2
- Amendment Date: 2024-07-02

### Procurement Information
- Procurement Category: Goods and Services
- Notice Type: Request for Proposal
- Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
- Trade Agreements: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Regions of Opportunity: World
- Regions of Delivery: Quebec, except National Capital Region
